method man: ive taught you well. everything i know. youve even surpassed my skill. but whys it so important. years ago your father was a royal guard. the best that there was. he won many royal merritts. and still during a special contest he was beaten by five martial experts. he was disgraced. so was our clan. it was long ago but he has never forgotten that day though. and your his only hope. to redeem the clan retrieve our honor
